name.baseName: Substrate Remediation;In-situ Mulching;Transportation;Transportation of Equipment and Materials to Site
底泥修复;原位覆盖;运输;运输到场的设备与材料

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: Sources for the production of AC is a fossil anthracite coal-based product from China. Transport from China 20 000 km.
所用生物炭来自中国的无烟煤化石产品，运输距离20000km。

time.common:timeRepresentativenessDescription: There is no clear start time for data collection in the literature, and the start time of the validity period is based on the publication time of the literature
文献中没有明确数据收集的开始时间，以文献发表时间为有效期的开始时间

locationOfOperationSupplyOrProduction.descriptionOfRestrictions: After investigation, no relevant domestic research literature has been found yet.
经查询，暂未找到国内有相关研究文献

technology.technologicalApplicability: The data set represents the industrial process of substrate remediation through in-situ mulching, which involves the use of activated carbon (AC) derived from fossil anthracite coal sourced from China. This process typically includes the transportation of necessary equipment and materials over a distance of 20,000 km to the remediation site. The primary use of this data is for environmental impact assessments within Life Cycle Assessments (LCAs) related to large-scale substrate remediation projects, particularly those which align with the scenario of Southern China.
该数据集代表了通过原位覆盖进行底泥修复的工业过程，该过程涉及使用源自中国的无烟煤化石产品生产的活性炭（AC）。此过程通常包括将必要的设备和材料运输20,000公里到修复现场。主要用途是在生命周期评估（LCA）中进行环境影响评估，尤其是与中国南方情景相符的大规模底泥修复项目。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataSelectionAndCombinationPrinciples: Process inventory data were obtained in accordance with ISO 14040 on LCA.35 Primary data were obtained from site-specific pot experiments, pilot studies, and vendors, which were representative of situations in Southern China.
初级数据清单是根据ISO 14040关于LCA.35的规定获得的。基本数据来自特定场地的盆栽实验、中试和供应商处获取，这些数据代表了中国南方的情况。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Sparrevik, M. et al. Use of Life Cycle Assessments To Evaluate the Environmental Footprint of Contaminated Sediment Remediation. Environ. Sci. Technol. 45, 4235–4241 (2011).
Sparrevik, M. et al. Use of Life Cycle Assessments To Evaluate the Environmental Footprint of Contaminated Sediment Remediation. Environ. Sci. Technol. 45, 4235–4241 (2011).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When using this data set for Life Cycle Assessments, it is necessary to consider the scope and regional applicability concerning substrate remediation projects in Southern China. The transportation distance of 20,000 km for equipment and materials should be factored into the assessment. Since no domestic research literature is available, the dataset lacks specific regional data; therefore, assumptions based on local conditions must be made with caution. The dataset's validity starts at the publication time of the literature due to the absence of a specific data collection start time. Lastly, the inventory data should only be used for LCA related to similar technological processes and within the frame of ISO 14040 LCA.35 guidelines.
在使用此数据集进行生命周期评估时，必须考虑与中国南方底泥修复项目有关的范围和区域适用性。应将设备和材料运输20,000公里的距离纳入评估。由于没有国内研究文献，数据集缺少特定区域数据；因此，基于当地条件的假设必须谨慎进行。由于缺少具体的数据收集开始时间，数据集的有效性从文献发布时间开始。最后，仅应将库存数据用于与类似技术过程相关的LCA，并遵守ISO 14040 LCA.35准则。

completeness.common:other: All maior raw materials and all the essentialenergy is ncuded.
输入输出流包括所有主要原材料和所有必要的能源消耗

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

referenceToFlowDataSet.common:shortDescription: Equipment and Materials Arriving on Site
